trans-unit.source: No modules have been registered. Please contact your system administrator.
trans-unit.target: Ingen moduler er registreret. Kontakt din systemadministrator om dette.

trans-unit.source: This is a short system overview. For advanced information please head to the Environment Module.
trans-unit.target: Dette er et kort systemoverblik. For avanceret information, åben dit <a href="%s">Miljø modul</a>.

trans-unit.source: Your system is fully operational. Have a nice day.
trans-unit.target: Dit system er fuldt operationelt. Fortsat god dag.

trans-unit.source: Logo: If set, this logo will be used instead of the TYPO3 logo above the login credential fields (e.g. fileadmin/images/login-logo.png or EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/login-logo.png or //domain.tld/login-logo.png)
trans-unit.target: Logo: Hvis sat vil dette logo blive brugt i stedet for TYPO3 logoet over log-ind legitimations-felterne (f. eks. fileadmin/images/login-logo.png eller EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/login-logo.png eller //domain.tld/login-logo.png)

trans-unit.source: Highlight Color: If set, this color will be used as highlight color in the login screen.
trans-unit.target: Fremhævet farve: Hvis sat vil denne farve blive brugt til at fremhæve farven på log-ind siden.

trans-unit.source: Background Image: If set, this image will be used as background image for the login screen (e.g. fileadmin/images/my-background.jpg or EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/my-background.jpg or //domain.tld/my-background.png)
trans-unit.target: Baggrundsbillede: Hvis angivet vil dette billede blive vist som baggrundsbillede på log-ind siden (f. eks. fileadmin/images/min-baggrund.jpg eller EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/min-baggrund.jpg eller //domain.tld/min-baggrund.png)

trans-unit.source: Footnote: If set, this text will be displayed on the login screen to provide copyright information for the background image (e.g. © 2017 by Foo Bar) or a descriptive text
trans-unit.target: Fodnote: Hvis valgt vil denne tekst blive vist på log ind siden for at tilføje copyright information til baggrundsbilledet (eksempelvis © 2017 af Foo Bar) eller en beskrivende tekst.

trans-unit.source: Logo: If set, this logo will be used instead of the TYPO3 logo in the TYPO3 Backend in the left top corner (e.g. fileadmin/images/backend-logo.png or EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/backend-logo.png
trans-unit.target: Logo: Hvis angivet vil logo blive anvendt i stedet for TYPO3s logo i øverste venstre hjørne af Backend (eksempelvis fileadmin/images/backend-logo.png eller EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/backend-logo.png)

trans-unit.source: Favicon: If set, this favicon will be used instead of the TYPO3 logo (e.g. EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/favicon.ico)
trans-unit.target: Favicon: Hvis angivet, vil denne favicon blive brugt i stedet for TYPO3s logo (f.eks. EXT:my_theme/Resources/Public/Images/favicon.ico)

trans-unit.source: You do not have access to any folder. Please ask your administrator to fix access permissions for your account.
trans-unit.target: Du har ikke adgang til nogen folder. Kontakt din administrator for at tilpasse rettighederne til din brugerkonto.
Log ind med brugernavn og adgangskode

trans-unit.source: Your login attempt did not succeed
Make sure to spell your username and password correctly, including upper/lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: Vær forsigtig med at stave dit brugernavn og adgangskode korrekt, herunder store/små bogstaver.

trans-unit.source: The record with uid %2$s from table %1$s could not be retrieved from the database. This data incosistency can occur if a base record has been deleted but the intermediate record from table %3$s with uid %4$s still points to it. To fix this situation, either delete the intermediate record, or recover the deleted record using the recycler module.
trans-unit.target: Elementet med uid %2$s fra tabellen %1$s kunne ikke hentes fra databasen. Den form for data-inkonsistens kan optræde, hvis et base-element er blevet slettet, men det aktuelle element %3$s med uid %4$s stadig peger på det. For at løse dette, skal du enten slette det aktuelle element, eller gendanne det slettede element ved hjælp af recycler modulet.
